[Rainmeter]
Update=5000 ; Less frequent updates
AccurateText=1

[MeasureLuaDensity]
Measure=Script
ScriptFile=#@#scripts\disk_density_checker.lua
UpdateDivider=1

; A grid of shapes representing disk areas
; This would likely be generated by a Lua script
[MeterGridArea1]
Meter=Shape
Shape=Rectangle 0,0,10,10 | Fill Color [MeasureLuaDensity:GetAreaColor(1)]
ToolTipText="[MeasureLuaDensity:GetAreaInfo(1)]"
